channel.title: Correlation Plot on Chris's Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Correlation Plot on Chris's Data Blog

item.title: Red Wine Analysis
item.description: Objective: My objective was to see if I could predict whether a wine was good or bad using the Random Forest Algorithm (using Random Forest and FFTrees). To run the model I train it on 70% of the data. I then test it against the test set or the other 30% to see how it does. Before I start the random Forest I do some Exploratory Analysis to see those factors that contribute to a wine being classified a Good Wine.
